title: Akron Beacon Journal - Wikipedia
snippet: The McClatchy Company bought Knight Ridder in June 2006 with intentions of selling 12 Knight Ridder newspapers. On August 2, 2006, McClatchy sold the Beacon Journal to Black Press. In 2018, GateHouse Media bought the newspaper. On November 11, 2013, the Akron Beacon Journal printed its last ...

title: Help Center - Akron Beacon Journal
snippet: Stay on the pulse with our apps. The beaconjournal.com app includes breaking news alerts, personalized news feeds with “My Topics,” offline reading and immersive VR experiences. The e-Newspaper, or Premium Edition, app allows you to access the latest print edition on any device, anytime.
